resources.string: Turn on mobile data or Wi-Fi to access the Facebook profile.
Turn on mobile data or Wi-Fi to visit AIS Family Database.
Turn on mobile data or Wi-Fi for e-mail.

This Android app contains phone numbers, blood groups, batch and email addresses of students of AIS FAMILY, Anyone can find contacts of a person by searching or by navigating through the listings and can call or email him/her directly from this app. If any new or updated information is available, update notification will automatically be showed when the phone is connected to the Internet.\n\nPlease share your comments or suggestions to improve this app further.
Saklayen Ahmed\nDepartment of Accounting and Information Systems\nUniversity of Rajshshi.
